alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:59AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wright, Sherburne and southeastern Stearns Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over Dassel, or 10 miles north of Hutchinson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cokato around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Howard Lake and Buffalo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 174 and 204. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 184 and 217. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 115 and 123. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 159 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
